name: The Space Station
description:
This game is developement. Report bug and donate for helping us. Visit our website (spacesheepteam.altervista.org)UPDATED VERSION AND MORE ON: IndieDBThis game could be converted for PC

In this survival game set in the space you will need to take control of an astronaut after working hard for years, finally decides to start his career in the field of space stations.

You'll need to accumulate various resources in order to survive: iron, money, water, oxygen and much more.

You can expand your space station through the rooms equipped with various features that allow you to survive and create a luxury space station. 

Embark on journeys to other planets. Orbit around them and works for other stations or land on planes and look for materials and life forms.

Explore unknown areas, and destroy bosses. Boost your spaceship to reach these remote areas

Features
  • Crafting
  • Resource (Iron, money, water...)
  • Room building
  • Enemies
  • Asteroids
  • Oxygen decreases over time
  • PLANETS: Carminium (Alpha)
  • NPC (Coming Soon)
  • Weapon
  • Drill
  • Minimap
  • Advanced Water
